description: This file is a server-side PHP script handling AJAX requests for network diagnostics. It provides functionality to test connectivity via ping, trace routes for IPv4 and IPv6, and returns diagnostic results in JSON format.

methods.name: test_connectivity
methods.description: Handles testing connectivity to a specified destination address and returns success count and status.

methods.name: destination_ipv4
methods.description: Performs a ping test to an IPv4 address and reports connectivity status.

methods.name: destination_ipv6
methods.description: Performs a ping test to an IPv6 address and reports connectivity status.

methods.name: trace_ipv4_dst
methods.description: Performs a traceroute to an IPv4 address and returns hop details.

methods.name: trace_ipv6_dst
methods.description: Performs a traceroute to an IPv6 address and returns hop details.
